import ky from'ky';// Only 1 ðŸ˜ƒ
var baseUrl='http://localhost:8080/records';var api={index:function index(){return ky.get(baseUrl).json();},update:function update(payload,id){return ky.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),{json:payload});},create:function create(payload){return ky.post(baseUrl,{json:payload}).json();},delete:function _delete(id){return ky.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));}};export default api;
